events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't updated for days.
The customer's message indicates a shipping delay, so the case has been categorized under Delivery Delay.
Assigning to the shipping support team to address the delivery delay issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I am sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Let me check the status for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look up the tracking details?
Sure, my order number is #123456789 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
I have contacted the courier service and found there has been a delay due to high package volume. Your order is expected to arrive within 3 more days.
Thanks for the update; I appreciate you checking. I will wait for a few more days and let you know if there are further issues.
We will keep monitoring the shipment and will notify you if there are any additional delays. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has arrived. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the package today. Everything looks good. Thanks for your help!
Glad to hear your package arrived safely. Closing the case now. Have a great day!
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please take a moment to share your feedback about our support.
